Class Book

Book
public class Book extends Object
Represents a book.

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String author, int barcode, int volume, boolean availability, Date dueDate)
      Constructs a Book object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the book.
      author - The author of the book.
      barcode - The barcode of the book.
      volume - The volume of the book.
      availability - The availability status of the book.
      dueDate - The due date of the book.
